jAyaqtE &su#rAq vai dEqvAn da#kShiNaqta upA#nayaqn tAn dEqvA u#paSaqyEnaiqvApA#-nudantaq ta-du#paSaqyasyO#-paSayaqtvaM ~Myad-da#kShiNaqta u#paSaqya u#paqSayEq BrAtRu#vyApanuttyaiq sarvEq vA aqnyE yUpA$H paSuqmantO&thO#paSaqya EqvApaqSustasyaq yaja#mAnaH paqSuryanna ni#rdiqSEdArtiq-mArcCEqd-
yaja#mAnOq&sau tE# paqSuritiq nirdi#SEqdyaM dviqShyAd-yamEqva- [  ] 17
